text: hananim-i malia adeul-eul me siala malhani geudeul-eun bunmyeong bulsin jadeul-ila mesia galodoe iseula el jasondeul-iyeo naui junim-igo neo huiui junim-in hananimman gyeongbaehala hananim-eul bulsinhaneun ja hananimkkeseogeudeul-e-ui cheongug-eul geumhasigo boljiog-eul geuui geojujilo hagehani joein deul-egeneun guwonjaga eobsnola
